title: Informal Science Learning Design for Urban Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in basic smartphone operations
context.additional_context: Utilizing informal learning contexts to address learning gaps in urban environments. Supporting learners to accumulate scientific inquiry experiences in daily life. Strengthening practical application skills through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and convert at least three observable scientific phenomena in urban daily environments into learning materials
Learners can design and implement weekly scientific inquiry projects using mobile devices and share the results
Learners can collaboratively develop at least one science-based solution applicable to local community problem-solving with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
